p.span: Welcome to the Odoo Furniture Store package!

template.p: This module optimizes your furniture store's daily operations by streamlining product sales, customer orders, and the management of both in-store inventory and your website's online catalog.
Odoo offers a complete solution to enhance efficiency and improve customer satisfaction across all your furniture store services.
You can access every installed App in your Odoo database on your main dashboard.

li.p: The Point of Sale (PoS) manages all your in-store activities and handles online "click and collect" orders.
The â€‹Inventory App keeps tabs on your stock levels, customer returns, and incoming deliveries.
The Website App powers your online store and manages your e-commerce presence.
The CRM & the Sales App helps you connect with customers and craft personalized promotions.
The â€‹Purchase App assists with restocking your products and managing supplier orders.

Each combination can have is own price, picture, and much more
Organize your inventory using three distinct category types:
Product categories for your internal classification
E-commerce categories for the website sections
Point Of Sale categories for your POS display
Set up promotional pricing in the price tabs.

li.p: After creating a product, remember to publish it to your e-commerce catalog so it's visible online.

template.p: You'll need to set up your e-commerce preferences to specify:

li.p: Accepted payment methods.
Available delivery options.
Any additional services you provide.

template.p: By default, "click & collect" and "Pay on site" are enabled. This means your customers can place their orders online, then pick up and pay for their products directly at your physical location.

p.span: Your Point of Sale (PoS) is your central hub for handling all in-store transactions, managing order preparation and display, and processing e-commerce click & collect orders.

li.p: Open the Point of Sale App and start a session from your furniture store.
Select the customer using the customer button (not mandatory).
Select or scan all the products.
If the customer wants home delivery, check "Ship later" and choose the delivery date.
Proceed to payment using the client's chosen method.

div.p: The "Note" button is where you can add special instructions for the preparation team.

span.strong: Processing a click and collect transaction

li.p: Open the Point of Sale App and start a session from your furniture store.
Click the three dots and choose "Quotation/Order."
Select the correct order and then "Settle the order."
Complete the transaction as outlined in the previous steps.
Open the Point of Sale (PoS) App and navigate to the "Preparation Display."
Select the order you're starting.
Gather all the products for that order.
Validate the preparation.

li.p: Add specific locations within your warehouse as needed. (You'll first need to enable the "Locations" setting in your Inventory configurations to use this feature.)
Open the Inventory App.
Select the relevant delivery.
Validate the transaction.

div.p: You can process partial deliveries by adjusting the quantity. Odoo will automatically generate a backorder for any remaining items.

li.p: Select the relevant delivery or PoS Order.
Click the "Return" button.
Choose the type of return you wish to perform.

template.p: If you select "Return for exchange," Odoo will automatically create a new delivery for the customer.

p.b: Define Vendors and Lead time on products

li.p: Open the Inventory App and go to "Replenishment."
Order all the products you need to replenish.
Once confirmed, Purchase Orders are automatically created in the Purchase App.

div.p: If you've set up reordering rules with an automatic trigger, Odoo will directly create draft Purchase Orders. If you prefer to review them in the replenishment module first, set the reordering rule's trigger to "Manual."

li.p: From the Purchase App, either select an existing purchase order or create a new one.
Add all necessary products to the order.
Send the purchase order to your vendor.
Confirm it. Odoo will automatically generate a receipt for the incoming products.
Process the receipt once the products arrive.

template.p: Odoo helps you perfectly tailor your website to your clients' needs. Easily integrate your internal policies, customize the contact form, showcase your latest arrivals, create an inspiration blog, and much more!

When a customer fills out your contact form, Odoo automatically creates an opportunity in the CRM App. This makes it simple to communicate with the client, address their specific needs, and even create a tailored quotation directly from the CRM.
